title: Playmime.com - A go-to tool for playing charades
description: It's a community driven go-to tool for charades (also known as pantomime)â€”no pen, no paper, no installing 100 different apps. Just open it up, get random words to act out, and let the fun begin! I built it to make charades easy and fun for everyone.

title: SureYouDo.io - The Best Way to Get Challenges Done
description: A trustless decentralized application (DApp) that allows individuals to lock in their pledges to achieve their goals, with the risk of losing their pledged amount if they fail, acts as a their motivator.

title: Merriam-Webster' Dictionary Browser Extension
description: An open-source Merriam-Webster dictionary extension for Chromium-based browsers with more than 20K users.

title: Twitter Following Track Bot
description: Use this bot to track if any account started following other accounts. It's easy to use and you only need a Twitter developer account to start monitoring.

title: Keyboard Shortcuts for Websites Chrome Extension
description: Keyboard shortcuts for actions of websites you use frequently. With Keyboard Shortcuts for Websites, you can define custom keyboard shortcuts for certain actions of websites you use frequently.

title: Ellipsis HTML Ellements
description: Mini tool to align HTML elements along an ellipse or a part of an ellipse. So you can arrange your HTML items along an ellipse easily without using canvas or any complex math functions.

title: JS Service Wrapper
description: A promise based collective service wrapper with queue support which totally works in browser and/or Node.js environment

title: Practical Front-End Projects
description: Collection of practical front-end projects with pure Javascript, CSS, and HTML
